#summary Extended FrSky LCD panel functionality.

= OSD_FrSky =

Main part of the mod is the added functionality of displaying the current state of the copter using Fuel Gauge located on the FrSky LCD screen.  

=== OSD_FrSky How-To ===

Instructions are located inside the OSD_FrSky.pde file.

http://code.google.com/p/megapirateng-add-ons/source/browse/trunk/ArduCopter/OSD_FrSky.pde

You may fine tune module to work with your mpNG version (2.8/2.9) by un-commenting the lines in the *void send_Fuel_level(void)* function.
